action.description: The action to be performed for the task

autoskipAt.description: The date and time at which the task should be automatically skipped

compiledSequenceTemplateHtml.description: HTML content representing the compiled template for a sequence of tasks.

completed.description: Indicates if the task has been completed

completedAt.description: The date and time at which the task was completed

createdAt.description: The date and time at which the task was created

defaultPluginMapping.description: Default plugin mapping for the task

dueAt.description: The date and time by which the task is due

note.description: Any additional notes or comments related to the task

opportunityAssociation.description: Association of the task with an opportunity

scheduledAt.description: The date and time at which the task is scheduled to occur

stateChangedAt.description: The date and time at which the task state was last changed

taskType.description: Type or category of the task

updatedAt.description: The date and time at which the task was last updated

account.description: The account associated with the task

call.description: Information about the call related to the task

calls.description: List of calls associated with the task

completer.description: Details of the user who completed the task

creator.description: Details of the user who created the task

mailing.description: Information related to mailing in the task

mailings.description: List of mailings associated with the task

opportunity.description: Details of the opportunity linked to the task

owner.description: Details of the user who is the owner of the task

prospect.description: Details of the prospect linked to the task

prospectAccount.description: Information about the prospect account related to the task

prospectContacts.description: List of contacts associated with the prospect in the task

prospectOwner.description: Details of the owner of the prospect linked to the task

prospectPhoneNumbers.description: Phone numbers associated with the prospect in the task

prospectStage.description: Details of the stage of the prospect related to the task

sequence.description: Details of the sequence associated with the task

sequenceSequenceSteps.description: List of sequence steps related to the sequence of the task

sequenceState.description: State of the sequence linked to the task

sequenceStateSequenceStep.description: Details of the sequence step in the sequence state

sequenceStateSequenceStepOverrides.description: Overrides for the sequence steps in the sequence state

sequenceStateStartingTemplate.description: Template used as the starting point for the sequence state

sequenceStep.description: Details of the step in the sequence related to the task

sequenceTemplate.description: Details of the template associated with the sequence

sequenceTemplateTemplate.description: The template used in the sequence template

subject.description: Subject or title of the task

taskPriority.description: Priority level assigned to the task

taskTheme.description: Theme or category associated with the task

template.description: Details of the template used for the task
